info.name: Gmail inbox - improve readability & adjust colours
info.description:
Annoyed that the gmail inbox comes in 2 flavours - white and black?

You can adjust this style to make the colours more suitable for you.

The colours used are suitable for the HD planets theme ONLY. You'll need to choose the appropriate colours for your theme of choice
info.additionalInfo:
I think the best way of choosing colours is to:

- take a colour pick of a dominant, neutral colour of your gmail theme
- use shades of that colour for the fonts & background
